user.description: Configure your SAJ solar inverter. Enter the IP address or hostname. For automatic discovery to work, the device hostname must start with 'saj-' or MAC address must start with '44:17:93'. If you select WiFi connection type, you will be asked for device credentials in the next step.

device_credentials.description: Enter device credentials for your SAJ inverter. These are only required when connecting via WiFi. Both fields are optional.
device_credentials.title: Device Credentials
